r.d: This extension embeds Google's V8 Javascript Engine into PHP.
r.n: - adapt to latest v8 API (v8 versions from 3.24.6 up to latest 4.3 branch supported now) - v8 debugging support - apply time & memory limits to V8Function calls - support mapping of PHP objects implementing ArrayAccess to native arrays - new API to set limits: setTimeLimit & setMemoryLimit methods on V8Js object - typesafe JavaScript function wrappers - improved back-and-forth object passing (rewrapping, correcty isolate unlocking) - fix property and method visibility issues - fix memory leaks
